title: THE TEMPORARY METHOD FOR SPARK AND TELSTRA USER TO LOG IN
body:
Hi guys,

I just have found a method to log in if u have problem "Unable to connect to the login queue". I just  have played 2 games, so far no problem at all. We only have problem of login, we are fine for playing games so here is the method. But this method only suitable for user whose computer has WIFI.

1. Disconnect your LAN or pull the wire off if u r LAN user, and connect ur computer to "Personal Hotpot" of ur phone by WIFI
2. Open LOL and login, u will find that ur able to login
3. Disconnect Personal Hotpot then connect LAN or the WIFI u used to use
4. Wait client to reconnect then u r ready to go!

NOTE: If u r using spark on mobile u may not able to use this method to login{{item:3151}} 



U will need to repeat dis method every single time u log in



GLHF!

replies.body: When you're with spark on mobile so it still doesn't work feelsbadman
